name: Riven
appearance: Lean and oil-smeared rigger with copper goggles, soot-dark braids bound in knot-charms, and a chain-link tattoo winding his left forearm.
character: Steady under pressure, stubborn about schedules, and quietly superstitious about any knot left untied.
talents: hears chain harmonics to judge unsafe loads
dreams: to captain Chainheart schedules without Loom interference
to patent a safer quick-release harness for riggers
secrets: meets an Oracle acolyte in private to trade safety warnings for schedule concessions
once pocketed a spare lift-chit to rush a friend past tariffs
